description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Year 43210, the best unit of Space Musketeers of the Imperial Republic has to survive the attack of the Vetustians, the biggest threat to the survival of humanity. You are their lieutenant in this graphic adventure/action-rpg, so solve the personal problems of your unit, bring out the best of them to increase their powers and unlock new skills while you discover the 7 endings of War Rapier 43210.
